original_title: Musique sans cesse et table rase
overview: A young man shut himself up in a house on sea shore for two weeks. He brought only music recorded tapes. He wants to write on music, the main question being for him: what represents music for man? He tells eight experiments done in different places or occasions (in a car, at the opera, at a rock gig, listening a walkman,..). He expresses how the way you are listening can affect your feelings and reflection. His voice and his written words appearing on screen are the mental counterpoint of silent images.
title: Musique sans cesse et table rase
